channel.title: Help!
channel.description: ok i am trying to move my home from allstarscape v1 to Ice Queen Lair but i dont know how to move my portals i can move the npcs thats easy but how do i move the portals...i cant find a tut any where :|

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @darkgama13 darkgama13
item.description:
@darkgama13 wrote:

[quote=“FudgeScape Owner, post:4, topic:218800”]in client.java, search makeglobalobject (cntrl f) then use this as the code
makeGlobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, ID, Face, 10);//
XXXX=x coord
YYYY= y coord
ID = onject id
face = -1 north -3 south -2 east 0 west
10 = just keep it 10
// = put the portal or object name or where it teles you to keep track
(after the //)[/quote]

THANK YOU FANILY SOME ONE IS ABLE TO HELP ME THANKS MAN REALLY

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @FudgeScape_Owner FudgeScape Owner
item.description:
@FudgeScape_Owner wrote:

in client.java, search makeglobalobject (cntrl f) then use this as the code
makeGlobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, ID, Face, 10);//
XXXX=x coord
YYYY= y coord
ID = onject id
face = -1 north -3 south -2 east 0 west
10 = just keep it 10
// = put the portal or object name or where it teles you to keep track
(after the //)

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @darkgama13 darkgama13
item.description:
@darkgama13 wrote:

i lured i:

go into your client.java file. Search eaither the code for the portal or the coords, after making sure it’s the corrct one, replace the coords, copile and run your server.

how do i find the portal code i have no idea on how to do that i am sorry
